net.kuujo.vertigo.io.port

Interface InputPortContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context<InputPortContext>, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serialization.JsonSerializable, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.Observable<InputPortContext>, PortContext<InputPortContext>

    public interface InputPortContext
extends PortContext<InputPortContext>
    Input port context represents a set of input connections for a single port within a single instance of a component.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      Returns the parent input context.
